xdi2.messaging.container.impl

Class AbstractStatementHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.impl.AbstractStatementHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatementHandler
    Deprecated. 
    Use AbstractContextHandler instead

    @Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractStatementHandler
extends Object
implements StatementHandler
    Checks what kind of statement and what kind of operation is being executed ($add, $get, ...) and calls the appropriate executeXXX() method
    Author:
    markus

                                     Operation operation,

                              throws Xdi2MessagingException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: StatementHandler
        Executes an XDI operation on a statement.
        Specified by:
        executeOnStatement in interface StatementHandler
        Parameters:
        targetStatement - The target statement.
        operation - The operation that is being executed.
        operationResultGraph - The result graph.
        executionContext - An "execution context" object for the entire XDI message envelope.
